messages.message:
:train2: *continuous deployment to major release sandboxes*
To give us more confidence and test coverage on our patches, we are rolling out continuous deployment to major release sandboxes, it will run the same schedule (every 4 hours) and deploy the head of the release branch to the corresponding aws sandbox (`http://release-Major-Minor-Patch.aws.sandbox.instabase.com`) for all major releases, this week we start with 22.01.0 and 21.10.0, with 21.07.0 and 21.04.0 to follow next week, we are also going to run system-tests, golden-tests and cypress-tests on them. So for your cherry-picks please keep an eye on those deployments :pray:
